title: Cam Newton, Russell Wilson, MLB, NBA, USC
itunes:title: Cam Newton, Russell Wilson, MLB, NBA, USC
description:
Colin talks about the Cam Newton rumors, the fact that Russell Wilson continues to get disrespected, MLB's plan for this season, why the NBA will be fine if they continue, and the issues teams like USC will probably face because of the pandemic. Guests include Nick Wright, Enes Kanter, Chris Haynes, and Scott Boras.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
